getCrawlsOfDomainById.responseNotes: Returns all crawls for domains with given id, if the authenticated user is allowed to see

getDomainById.responseNotes: Returns domains with given id, if the authenticated user is allowed to see

getDomains.responseNotes: Returns a list of all domains the authenticated user is allowed to see

getAllCrawls.responseNotes: Returns all crawls which the authenticated user is allowed to see

getCrawlRobotsTxtById.responseNotes: Returns list of robots.txt for crawl with given ID, if the authenticated user is allowed to see
getCrawlRobotsTxtById.summary: Returns list of robots.txt for crawl with given ID

getCrawlById.responseNotes: Returns crawl with given ID, if the authenticated user is allowed to see

getCrawlByIdHostsByOutgoingLinks.responseNotes: Returns list of hosts sorted by number of outgoing links
getCrawlByIdHostsByOutgoingLinks.summary: Returns list of hosts sorted by number of outgoing links

getCrawlByIdHostsByPages.responseNotes: Returns list of hosts sorted by number of pages
getCrawlByIdHostsByPages.summary: Returns list of hosts sorted by number of pages

getCrawlByIdHostsById.responseNotes: Returns pages of host with given ID

details.description: If true, show full page reports instead of simple pages

getCrawlByIdHostsByIncomingLinks.responseNotes: Returns list of hosts sorted by number of incoming links
getCrawlByIdHostsByIncomingLinks.summary: Returns list of hosts sorted by number of incoming links

getCrawlByIdPagesByIdOutgoingLinks.responseNotes: Returns outgoing links for page with page_id of crawl with given ID, if the authenticated user is allowed to see

reach.description: Filter by ID of link reach, see /linkreaches

details.description: If true, show full page reports instead of simple pages

type.description: Filter by ID of link type, see /linktypes, or 30x for all redirects

getCrawlByIdPagesByIdIncomingLinks.responseNotes: Returns incoming links for page with page_id of crawl with given ID, if the authenticated user is allowed to see

reach.description: Filter by ID of link reach, see /linkreaches

details.description: If true, show full page reports instead of simple pages

type.description: Filter by ID of link type, see /linktypes, or 30x for all redirects

getCrawlByIdPages.responseNotes: Returns all pages of crawl with given ID

details.description: If true, show full page reports instead of simple pages

getCrawlByIdPagesById.responseNotes: Returns pages with page_id of crawl with given ID, if the authenticated user is allowed to see

getCrawlByIdPagesByIdReport.responseNotes: Returns report for page with page_id of crawl with given ID, if the authenticated user is allowed to see

getCrawlByIdPagesFind.responseNotes: Returns pages with given URL, if part of crawl

url.description: Full URL of page to look for

getCrawlByIdPagesByIdCrawl.responseNotes: Returns a live analysis report for page with page_id of crawl with given ID, if the authenticated user is allowed to see
getCrawlByIdPagesByIdCrawl.summary: Live page report for given page

getCrawlByIdReportHints.responseNotes: Returns a list of all hints that were triggered

getCrawlByIdReportHintsForValue.responseNotes: Returns all pages of crawl with given ID, that have a certain hint, if the authenticated user is allowed to see
getCrawlByIdReportHintsForValue.summary: List of pages with given hint

details.description: If true, show full page reports instead of simple pages

value.description: Hint ID, as can be looked up at /hints/

getCrawlByIdReportResponsetimesForValue.responseNotes: Returns all pages of crawl with given ID, that have a response time in given range, if the authenticated user is allowed to see
getCrawlByIdReportResponsetimesForValue.summary: List of pages that fall in given response time range

details.description: If true, show full page reports instead of simple pages

value.description: Response time range ID, as can be looked up at /responsetimes/

getCrawlByIdReportLinksIncoming.responseNotes: Returns all pages of crawl with given ID, sorted by number of incoming links, if the authenticated user is allowed to see
getCrawlByIdReportLinksIncoming.summary: List of pages sorted by number of incoming links

details.description: If true, show full page reports instead of simple pages

getCrawlByIdReportErrors.responseNotes: Returns all errors that occurred during crawl with given ID, if the authenticated user is allowed to see
getCrawlByIdReportErrors.summary: List of errors that occurred during crawl

details.description: If true, show full page reports instead of simple pages

getCrawlByIdReportLevelCrawled.responseNotes: Returns a list of level statistics (number of pages, percent on level et al) regarding crawled pages
getCrawlByIdReportLevelCrawled.summary: List of statistics on crawled pages per level

getCrawlByIdReportLinksIncomingExternal.responseNotes: Returns all pages of crawl with given ID, sorted by number of external incoming links, if the authenticated user is allowed to see
getCrawlByIdReportLinksIncomingExternal.summary: List of pages sorted by number of external incoming links

details.description: If true, show full page reports instead of simple pages

getCrawlByIdReportLevelDiscovered.responseNotes: Returns a list of level statistics (number of pages, percent on level et al) regarding discovered pages
getCrawlByIdReportLevelDiscovered.summary: List of statistics on dicovered pages per level

getCrawlByIdReport.responseNotes: Returns detailed report for crawl with given ID, if the authenticated user is allowed to see
getCrawlByIdReport.summary: Returns detailed report for crawl with given ID

getCrawlByIdReportStatusForValue.responseNotes: Returns all pages of crawl with given ID, that have a certain status (like crawled or error), if the authenticated user is allowed to see
getCrawlByIdReportStatusForValue.summary: List of pages with given status

details.description: If true, show full page reports instead of simple pages

value.description: Status value ID, as can be looked up at /status/pages/

getCrawlByIdReport2DRank.responseNotes: Returns all page sorted by 2D rank for crawl with given ID, if the authenticated user is allowed to see
getCrawlByIdReport2DRank.summary: List of pages sorted by 2D index

details.description: If true, show full page reports instead of simple pages

getCrawlByIdReportLevelDiscoveredForValu.responseNotes: Returns all pages of crawl with given ID, that are crawled and on given level, if the authenticated user is allowed to see
getCrawlByIdReportLevelDiscoveredForValu.summary: List of crawled pages on given level

details.description: If true, show full page reports instead of simple pages

getCrawlByIdReportLinksOutgoing.responseNotes: Returns all pages of crawl with given ID, sorted by number of outgoing links, if the authenticated user is allowed to see
getCrawlByIdReportLinksOutgoing.summary: List of pages sorted by number of outgoing links

details.description: If true, show full page reports instead of simple pages

getCrawlByIdReportPagerank.responseNotes: Returns all page sorted by pagerank for crawl with given ID, if the authenticated user is allowed to see
getCrawlByIdReportPagerank.summary: List of pages sorted by pagerank index

details.description: If true, show full page reports instead of simple pages

getCrawlByIdReportCheirank.responseNotes: Returns all page sorted by cheirank for crawl with given ID, if the authenticated user is allowed to see
getCrawlByIdReportCheirank.summary: List of pages sorted by cheirank index

details.description: If true, show full page reports instead of simple pages

getCrawlByIdReportDuplicateContentSource.responseNotes: Returns all duplicate content groups for given source

details.description: If true, show full page reports instead of simple pages

source.description: ID of duplicate content source (for duplicate title, description etc)

getCrawlByIdReportSizesCompressedForValu.responseNotes: Returns all pages of crawl with given ID, that have a compressed size in given range, if the authenticated user is allowed to see
getCrawlByIdReportSizesCompressedForValu.summary: List of pages that have a compressed size in given range

details.description: If true, show full page reports instead of simple pages

value.description: Size range ID, as can be looked up at /sizes/compressed/

getCrawlByIdReportDuplicateContentById.responseNotes: Returns all duplicate content groups for given source

details.description: If true, show full page reports instead of simple pages

getCrawlByIdReportSizesUncompressedForVa.responseNotes: Returns all pages of crawl with given ID, that have an uncompressed size in given range, if the authenticated user is allowed to see
getCrawlByIdReportSizesUncompressedForVa.summary: List of pages that have an uncompressed size in given range

details.description: If true, show full page reports instead of simple pages

value.description: Size range ID, as can be looked up at /sizes/uncompressed/

getCrawlByIdReportHttpStatusForValue.responseNotes: Returns all pages of crawl with given ID, that have a certain HTTP status, if the authenticated user is allowed to see
getCrawlByIdReportHttpStatusForValue.summary: List of pages with given HTTP status

details.description: If true, show full page reports instead of simple pages

getCancelFlags.responseNotes: Returns a list of all possible cancel flags

getRobotTxtFlags.responseNotes: Returns a list of all possible robot.txt flags

getResponseTimesById.responseNotes: Returns a single response time range
getResponseTimesById.summary: Return response time range with given IDF

getSizesCompressedById.responseNotes: Returns a single compressed file size range
getSizesCompressedById.summary: Return compressed file size range with given ID

getResponseTimes.responseNotes: Returns a list of all response time ranges

getErrors.responseNotes: Returns a list of all possible errors

getRobotTxtFlagsById.summary: Return robots.txt flag with given ID

getStatusPages.responseNotes: Returns a list of all possible status a page may have
getStatusPages.summary: Return all possible status for pages

getSections.responseNotes: Returns a list of all possible crawl sections (scheduled, crawling, calculating)

getStatusCrawlsById.responseNotes: Returns crawl status with given ID

getSizesUncompressedById.responseNotes: Returns a single uncompressed file size range
getSizesUncompressedById.summary: Return uncompressed file size range with given ID

getStatusPagesById.responseNotes: Returns crawl status with given ID

getLinkTypesById.summary: Return link type with given ID

id.description: ID of link type to return

getCancelFlagsById.summary: Return cancel flag with given ID

getSectionsById.summary: Return crawl section with given ID

getLinkTypes.responseNotes: Returns a list of all possible link types (follow, nofollow, etc)

getHostLocations.responseNotes: Returns a list of all possible host locations (local, external, etc)

getSizesCompressed.responseNotes: Returns a list of all compressed file size ranges
getSizesCompressed.summary: Return all compressed file size ranges

getLinkReachesById.summary: Return link reach with given ID

id.description: ID of link reach to return

getHostLocationsById.summary: Return host location with given ID

getStatusCrawls.responseNotes: Returns a list of all possible status a crawl may have
getStatusCrawls.summary: Return all possible status for crawls

getLinkReaches.responseNotes: Returns a list of all possible link reaches (local, external, etc.)

getHints.responseNotes: Returns a list of all possible hints

getSizesUncompressed.responseNotes: Returns a list of all uncompressed file size ranges
getSizesUncompressed.summary: Return all uncompressed file size ranges

enabled.description: Whether module is enabled or not
